The Official Iron Yard Styleguide

Color Variables

Gray option for section backgrounds

// variable
$gray-light

// class
.gray-light-bg
.gray-light-triangle

Another gray option for a section

// variable
$gray-med

// class
.gray-med-bg
.gray-med-text
.gray-med-triangle

Footer background & default text color

// variable
$gray-dark

// class
.gray-dark-bg
.gray-dark-text
.gray-dark-triangle

Typography

Headings

h1. Hella mumblecore

h2. Letterpress fashion axe

h3. Deep v bicycle rights

h4. Put a bird on it

h5. Tofu organic
---
h1 Hella mumblecore
h2 Letterpress fashion axe
h3 Deep v bicycle
h4 Put a bird on it
h5 Tofu organic

Paragraphs

Art party wayfarers Schlitz photo booth lomo, authentic whatever bicycle rights Thundercats DIY. Master cleanse Portland squid, beard keytar Helvetica sriracha street art gentrify art party ethnic. Typewriter fixie kale chips craft beer Truffaut. Vegan direct trade meh, pour-over actually kale chips wayfarers Portland. Cardigan Williamsburg flexitarian, narwhal master cleanse McSweeney's banh mi letterpress ennui brunch chia polaroid hoodie meggings 8-bit.

Here is what a paragraph would look like. And here is a link.

---
p Art party wayfarers Schlitz photo booth lomo ... 
---
p Here is a paragraph with a <a href="#">link</a>.

Unordered Lists

  • Selvage Portland keytar
  • Hashtag PBR&B
  • For longer bullets, use the <strong> tag at the beginning.Wes Anderson craft beer 90's, leggings bitters gentrify gastropub normcore Shoreditch polaroid Cosby sweater tattooed. Drinking vinegar brunch leggings Carles, chillwave authentic cray stumptown cardigan hella. Meh artisan lo-fi pour-over distillery. Gluten-free put a bird on it drinking vinegar, Thundercats mumblecore wayfarers blog scenester small batch.
    • Raw denim
    • Gluten-free Etsy pug
    • Thundercats
---
ul
  li Selvage Portland keytar
  li Hashtag PBR&B
  li <strong>For longer bullets ...</strong> ...
  ul
    li Raw denim
    li Gluten-free Etsy pug
    li Thundercats

Ordered Lists

  1. Direct trade
  2. Neutra bitters
  3. Wes Anderson
---
ol
  li Direct trade
  li Neutra bitters
  li Wes Anderson

Pullquotes

"Organic YOLO chambray American Apparel kale chips. Squid stumptown cardigan gentrify, try-hard seitan sartorial gluten-free messenger bag before they sold out."

- Hispteria Crazedor, Coffee Shop Prophet
---
blockquote
  p. 
    "Organic YOLO chambray American Apparel kale chips. 
    Squid stumptown cardigan gentrify, try-hard seitan 
    sartorial gluten-free before they sold out." 
  footer - Hispteria Crazedor, Coffee Shop Prophet

Containers

Single Column Container

Questions? Want to know what makes us different?

Call (855) 399-2275 to talk to someone on the team.

(You can also shoot us an email or jump into our Academy Chat.) 
---
.callout-box
  h4 Questions? Want to know what makes us different?
  p. 
    Call <strong><a href="tel:+18553992275"> (855) 399-2275</a></strong>
    to talk to someone on the team.
  span.
    (You can also <a href="#">shoot us an email</a> or jump into 
      our <a href="#">Academy Chat</a>.)

Two Column With Divider

Left Column

Pork belly banjo asymmetrical slow-carb, gluten-free farm-to-table synth lo-fi.

Irony kitsch synth meh. Food truck Blue Bottle swag, wolf Odd Future slow-carb Etsy Intelligentsia synth High Life narwhal tofu. Sustainable ugh kale chips pop-up Blue Bottle Intelligentsia, Odd Future chillwave.

Right Column

  • sold out locavore irony
  • Austin bicycle rights beard
  • small batch vegan sriracha PBR
---
.two-col-sb
  .row
    //add .divider-left to the column on the left to create the divider
    .col-sm-6.divider-left
      h2 Left Column 
      p Copy
    .col-sm-6
      h4 Right Column
      p More copy

Say hello

Nyan

Erlang Engineer

American Apparel wayfarers normcore mustache, Truffaut Intelligentsia XOXO irony deep v photo booth locavore next level. Helvetica post-ironic four loko dreamcatcher normcore gluten-free, tofu Wes Anderson. Next level retro Schlitz, cardigan cliche jean shorts shabby chic. Hashtag cliche bitters cred Banksy salvia. Austin ennui raw denim Thundercats, wolf asymmetrical paleo.

Layout

Complete Nav-Bar with Triangle

  • Locations
  • Events
  • Academy
  • Accelerator
  • Jobs
  • About
  • News
  • Blog

Cool Nav

  • Hire Graduates
  • Alumni
  • FAQs
  • Kids Classes 
---
  .container-fluid
    .header.gray-dark-bg
      .wrapper
        .logo
          img(src="images/iron-yard-logo.svg")
        .nav
          .primary-nav
            ul
              li: a(href="#") Locations
              li ...
          .secondary-nav
            ul
              li ...
              
    .row.sub-nav.gray-dark-bg
      .wrapper 
        h2 Cool Nav
        ul
          li: a(href="#") Hire Graduates
          li ...
        // the second class is used to determine the color of the triangle. 
        // the color must match the class applied to .header and .sub-nav           
        .triangle.gray-dark-triangle

Screen-Width Section

Awesome Content

Letterpress quinoa raw denim, hoodie kale chips stumptown biodiesel Echo Park scenester XOXO 8-bit you probably haven't heard of them. Banksy Helvetica gentrify, distillery hoodie selfies art party American Apparel Truffaut fashion axe irony Tumblr salvia 8-bit keffiyeh.

Great Job

  • Sustainable kale chips
  • Blue Bottle boat shoes
  • Odd Future chillwave
---
  // As long as you have a .container nested within the .horizontal-section div,
  // you can use whatever content you like within this class.
  .horizontal-section.gray-light-bg
    .container
      .row
        .col-md-6
          h2.section-headline Awesome Content
          p Letterpress quinoa raw denim, 8-bit stumptown biodiesel. . . 
        .col-md-6
          h2.section-headline Great Job
          ul
            li Sustainable kale chips
            li Blue Bottle boat shoes
            li Odd Future chillwave
